EnvironmentShadowDrawEnable Class Reference

This class tells sky domes and other environmental objects to draw using their shadowing shaders, instead of their standard shader. More...

Detailed Description

This class tells sky domes and other environmental objects to draw using their shadowing shaders, instead of their standard shader.
